post.body: You can copy a url from itunes, and paste in in safari. Add any param (i.e. blahblah&x=y) and it will avoid the cache
mega bad caching. Try getting the url for the itunes page you want, paste it in to your safari address bar,& add a param to it
Just tried that trick you blogged about adding a param to the url to update itune's cache. Worked nicely thanks!
pegjump?
looking at your website. You go invert on a Jetski ?!?!?!
Ahh bummer. They told me it's almost done about 2 weeks ago.
Thanks for the feedback on that point. Submitting scores to a global tracker is the thing I most want to add.
Depends. It's 'clear' on the comp page available in the game.Could have been a lot better & bigger everywhere
Thanks Jerry, glad to hear you like it. :-)
Yep - that would have been a better idea. A much better idea. Where were you 2 weeks ago? :-)
thanks for letting me know.
Had some fun doing the BurnBall random prize draw with Tane today. Watch him shake the box -> http://is.gd/evr1
LMAO -> RT @chockenberry: i finally have @gruber password had to learn chinese and set up fishing sight to get it but now i can be him
I guess I should mention I'm a big fan of slicehost for hosting now.
Ha - two subsequent tweets: @majicdave tweets above leaving dreamhost, and @zyote pimps them. I'd stay well away myself. (Had pain 2y ago)
Going to Avalon park
Waiting for Kio to wake up so we can take the kids to the park. It's a lovely sunny day here.
I wonder why Tane thinks 6am is a good time to get up these days. He has a younger brother now, and suddenly it's a race to be first up?
Playing PegJump Plus. Nice game for the train when my brain needs a workout.
Looks like Kana is properly listed in itunes again now. Phew.
